channel.title: Refactoring on Incubyte Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Refactoring on Incubyte Blog

item.title: Code Tidying: The Story of a Backseat Driver
item.description: Let’s embark on a thought experiment. Envision yourself as a driving virtuoso, conquering city streets with gear shifts smoother than a buttered dolphin on a rainbow.

item.title: The Compounding Effect of Tidying Using CodeScene
item.description: It turns out that most of a developer’s tasks end up being tactical activities, such as adding a text box here, adding a checkbox there, fixing a bug, or working with an outage.
